properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 5:07AM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio...

Portage River At Woodville
Sandusky River At Tiffin
Sandusky River Above Fremont
Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck
Eagle Creek Above Findlay
Huron River Near Milan
Blanchard River Near Findlay
Maumee River Near Grand Rapids
Maumee River At Waterville
Scioto River Near Larue
Scioto River Near Prospect

The flood warning continues for
The Maumee River At Waterville.
* From Sunday morning until Wednesday morning.
* There is no current observed data.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by Sunday morning
and continue to rise to near 12.8 feet by early Monday morning.The
river will fall below flood stage by early Wednesday morning.
* At 13.0 feet...Floodwaters can back up through storm drains onto
Water Street in Waterville making roads inaccessible.
properties.instruction:
Never drive your car through flooded roadways. The water may be
deeper than it appears. Turn around...don't drown!

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and other local media for further
details and updates.
